price: Na kwa walio mkufuru Mola wao Mlezi ipo adhabu ya Jahannamu. Na ni marejeo maovu yalioje hayo!
arabic: وَلِلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ بِرَبِّهِمۡ عَذَابُ جَهَنَّمَۖ وَبِئۡسَ ٱلۡمَصِيرُ
footnotes: Na kwa ajili ya wasio muamini Mola wao Mlezi tumewawekea adhabu ya Jahannamu. Na huo ndio mwisho muovu kweli kwao.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: walilladhīna kafarū birabbihim ʿadhābu jahannama wabi'sa al-maṣīru
